13 void StepServer::robotino_two_d_move_callback(const factory_floor_manager::robotino_two_d_move_stepGoalConstPtr &goal) {
14  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<robotino_local_move::LocalMoveAction> client("robotino_move_client");
15  client.waitForServer();
16  robotino_local_move::LocalMoveGoal client_goal;
17  client_goal.move_x = goal->move_x;
18  client_goal.move_y = goal->move_y;
19  client_goal.rotation = goal->rotation;
20  client.sendGoal(client_goal);
21  while(!client.waitForResult(ros::Duration(3.0))) {
22  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the robotino to finish its task...");
23  }
24  _robotino_two_d_move_step_as.setSucceeded();
25 }
